text:
Hey, Producer,
what are your thoughts on L'Antica's future!?

Well, there are so many amazing idols in our agency,
I feel like we need to work even harder!
Yes, that's right. Our leader here has gotten fired up,

I think it's more important to steadily
build up stamina than to do something special.

Oh, I see...
Well, all of that ends up on stage anyway.

Yeah, yeah,
Having fans who support our activities is crucial, right?

We've got to cherish the people who cheer us on!
Make sure to thank all the fans for us!

Above all, I want everyone
To enjoy idol activities.

I see... Then I can rest easy!
Thanks to you, Producer, we're having a blast, seriously.
